==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}} - grain ({{zh-l|*禾}}) over a mouth (originally {{zh-l|*口}}). The large and small seal script forms are more specific about what kind of grain, and uses {{zh-l|*黍}} (glutinous millet) instead of {{lang|zh|禾}}. Bottom is unrelated to {{zh-l|*日}}, and is instead {{zh-l|*甘}} or {{zh-l|*曰}}.
